description: This PHP file renders a web page displaying detailed information about the Comcast Network connection, including general network status, IP addresses, DNS, DHCP details, and DPoE (Distributed Parameters over Ethernet) details such as modem info, firmware, MAC tables, and statistics.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Performs division of two numbers, returning quotient and remainder as an array.

methods.name: sec2dhms
methods.description: Converts seconds into a formatted string representing days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
